Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.message

Interface Message

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
CardMessage, ChosenCloud, GenericMessage, MoveMotherNature, MoveStudent, PingMessage, SetupConnection, SetupGame, Special10Message, Special11Message, Special12Message, Special1Message, Special3Message, Special5Message, Special7Message, Special9Message, UseSpecial
public interface Message extends Serializable
Message interface is implemented by every client's message because it allows to serialize them and server can recognize them.
